name: Protect the plant
description:
A rushed game about protecting a plant.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Move the mouse around to protect the plant from the bugs while allowing water drops to reach the plant.
  • Complete missions in order to grow fruit.
  • Grow as much fruit as you can before the plant withers away.

Made by: Simply

Music and SFX by: Jamesy Downie @jamesyknowsall
